Body:
data = parse_compound_formula(formula)
assert len(data) == len(element_mass_fraction
    ), 'The number of elements in the parsed data is incorrect'
for e in element_mass_fraction.keys():
    assert e in data, f'Element {e} is not found in parsed data'
    npt.assert_almost_equal(data[e]['massFraction'], element_mass_fraction[
        e], err_msg=f'Mass fraction for element {e} was evaluated incorrectly')
pytest.mark.parametrize('formula, element_mass_fraction', [('Fe2O3', {'Fe':
    0.6994364433312461, 'O': 0.30056355666875395}), ('C', {'C': 1.0})])
